question: After Hajj If a person leaving makha without performing tawafe wada and if he he is living in SAUDI ARABIA, so what he can do now. (He left Makha because he don't know tawafe wada obligatory)
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Tawaaf-e-Wida' is compulsory on a person who resides out of Makkah. Of he missed it out for whatever reason; he should be commanded to carry it
out as long as he is in Makkah. If he has already left Makkah and returned home, he should slaughter a goat or sheep as a penalty.
(Hidaayah vol.1 pg.274)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
